text: The 2019–20 Slovak Basketball League season was the 28th season of the top- tier basketball competition in Slovakia. It started on 5 October 2019 and ended prematurely on 13 March 2020 without any declared champion due to the coronavirus pandemic. ==Competition format== Ten teams joined the regular season, consisted in playing against each other four times home-and-away in double a round-robin format. The eight first qualified teams advance to the playoffs. ==Teams== The same nine teams of the previous season repeated participation in the league. {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team !! City !!
